tab.name: Options
tab.option: Size of the resulting image in each dimension.

If true, the given values for each dimension are interpreted as factors (i.e. oldDim*factor = size of new dimension). Else, the values are interpreted as the absolute dimension sizes of the new image.
Determines how to interpolate the pixels.

If checked, the interpolation is done on the fly, whenever the image data is accessed. This means, accessing the image is more expensive, but memory is saved. If unchecked, the interpolation is done right away. For larger calculations we suggest to uncheck "Virtual Interpolation".
